dataList.content: Tch… Non solo c'è la sicurezza, ma anche i Peccatula… Sto cominciando a preoccuparmi…
Hai qualche idea, Greg? In passato hai combattuto in prima linea, no? Fa' qualcosa.
E questo che c'ent— Ehi, non spingere!
A furia di venir spinto da Rodya, Gregor inciampò in avanti, separandosi da noi…
…Per poi scontrarsi con uno schiavo intento a scavare la roccia.
In quel momento, si fermarono entrambi.
E… Ehilà, salve, sembra che le cose non vadano bene a nessuno di noi due, eh? Perché non facciamo finta che non sia successo niente?
Non ci interessano i soldi di quel caveau.
Voglio dire, se ce lo offrissero non diremmo di no—il punto è, vogliamo solo andare al piano di sotto.
Non vogliamo disturbare. Perché non facciamo finta che non sia successo nulla, e ognuno va per la sua strada?

dataList.title: Casinò della J Corp.
dataList.content: Q… Quaranta…

dataList.title: Casinò della J Corp.
dataList.content: Quarantasette milioni, novecentoventimila…

dataList.title: Casinò della J Corp.
dataList.content: Quarantasette milioni, novecentodiecimila… Quarantasette milioni, novecentomila…
Speak some sense, or I'll BARF on your hands.
For someone who often speaks in riddles herself, Ryōshū's patience sure wore out quickly. She gripped the sheath of her sword as she threatened the worker.
I can't say for sure, but I think she meant she'll “break all the remaining fingers” on that person's hands…
<…At this point, I'm more scared of how quickly you got that.>

dataList.title: Casinò della J Corp.
dataList.content: Must repay…

dataList.title: Casinò della J Corp.
dataList.content: Repay all the debt… before I can go back to my family…

dataList.title: Casinò della J Corp.
dataList.content: They said they'll take off 1 Ahn for every swing… Forty-seven… How much…was it… Aack! Don't talk to me! I have to count…

dataList.title: Casinò della J Corp.
dataList.content: Hold on? What's that noise over there?
Ah, shoot…
Cornered, Gregor suddenly started shouting in a remarkably out-of-character voice.
We… We can't live like this anymore!
This is… outrageous… tyranny! To tie people up and force them to dig!
Let us all… rise up… and fight our oppressors…! Go, onwaaard!!
The hell was that?
Propaganda. His effort has regrettably ended in failure.
Greg, sweetie… Here's the thing about those people… They ended up here by living their whole lives as scum—exploiters and exploitees.
You weren't expecting some half-baked speech to be enough to wake up the revolutionary inside them, were you?
…Before you attempt an instigation operation next time, be sure to train your acting skills to at least an intermediate level.
Oh, Greg… Have you never tried acting in your whole life?
Scheibenkleister… Look, I'm embarrassed myself…
Gregor's terrible acting must have even agitated the security as well.
That'd explain them opening up those locked cages in a potentially risky move.
